content: Aileen Zhai is an undergraduate in philosophy and physics at Carnegie Mellon University. Her research background is in neutrino physics. She worked for IceCube in 2017 and MicroBooNE in 2018. Her career goal is to become a researcher in experimental particle physics either at a university or national lab.
